data.text: @JeffBrees @twasted23 @lapublichealth @kenjeong We can agree on that. I'm so tired of this as well. If I were 30 and not 59 I would feel different for sure. Cheers.

@Fallingheight @twasted23 @lapublichealth @kenjeong forever?  well, we disagree.  in a very crowded space, i will probably wear one.  anywhere else.  nope. but, i wholeheartedly support anyone else who wants to wear one.

@JeffBrees @twasted23 @lapublichealth @kenjeong You posed a question, I tried to answer it. Since we still haven't cured the common cold, there is much we don't know about the behavior of this virus either. We are pretty sure it travels from the mouth to other things. Plugging the mouth seems a good start.
@Fallingheight @twasted23 @lapublichealth @kenjeong could...aka, not proven.  grasping at straws. show evidence, otherwise, purely supposition.
@slippy_maxwell @lapublichealth Let me know the next time you're in surgery and your surgeon refuses to wear a mask because it makes it "hard to breathe".
@lapublichealth Im so glad I don't wear this fkn mask and I don't listen to you

@huero222 @Skwidwurd2 @lapublichealth I am returning to work at the Port of Los Angeles. No one is going to stop this from happening especially those who rely on free government money eg stimulus checks.
@huero222 @lapublichealth Not a chance. I have a life.
